channel.title: Where can i find the specials codes
channel.description: I have got a question about the specials in my source. With 80 str bout 69 str bonus with dragon claws, using sup str (no prayer) i've hitted 0-0-34-0 with dragon claws special which i think is way to overpowered, same with the armadyl godsword which is overpowered aswell. How do I get to the file where i can adjust the settings of specials. (to overpower and underpower) I don't want off-topic questions, I just want to know if it's possible to edit it. Also i've found the stats of a weapon (e.g. str bonus ) but im still searching for the special attacks file Im using Project Legacy source.

item.title: Where can i find the specials codes
item.dc:creator: @Phonicstudios Phonicstudios
item.description:
@Phonicstudios wrote:

I have found the codes, c.specdamage was the one i wanted (i overpowered ags 270%) and i hitted a 99… so thats working thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Where can i find the specials codes

item.title: Where can i find the specials codes
item.dc:creator: @Maikie61 Maikie61
item.description:
@Maikie61 wrote:

Change the c.specaccurary or c.specdamage if one of them are there.

Read full topic
item.source: Where can i find the specials codes

item.title: Where can i find the specials codes
item.dc:creator: @Phonicstudios Phonicstudios
item.description:
@Phonicstudios wrote:

Panic, i know that…
Theres no specials.java
The accuracy, yes indeed i have found that in the combatassistant.java but i’ve found some kind of function called:
calculateMeleeMaxHit
About the accuracy and that, in the combatassistant i’ve found this

Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex];
if (Misc.random(calculateMeleeAttack()) > Misc.random(o.getCombat().calculateMeleeDefence())) {
c.clawDamage = Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit() + Misc.random(4));
}

also I’ve found
c.

c.specAccuracy = 9.9;
c.clawDamage = 0;

Read full topic
item.source: Where can i find the specials codes

item.title: Where can i find the specials codes
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

is there a combatassistant.java or itemassistant.java
thats where you can switch up the spec accuracy a bit

Read full topic

item.title: Where can i find the specials codes
item.dc:creator: @Untrimmed Untrimmed
item.description:
@Untrimmed wrote:

P A N I C he is looking for the file which contains the special attack information, I would get it, but I am not home.
EDIT: If it is PI (Project Insanity) I think the file is specials.java.

Read full topic
item.source: Where can i find the specials codes

item.title: Where can i find the specials codes
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

Go to item.cfg and replace with these codes: (these are dragon claws/ags runescaep hits)

[code]item = 35 Armadyl Godsword A Powerful Godsword Made To Own. 160.036754819048 160.036754819048 181.443095635579 20 29 -2 0 0 0 3 2 1 0 150 0

item = 6587 Dragon_claws _ 0 0 0 41 57 -4 0 0 13 26 7 0 0 56 0[/code]

Read full topic
